sample

Class DestroyBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.DestroyBlock

  • public class DestroyBlock
extends java.lang.Object
    It is the class used to create a Lightning Spark - DestroyBlock. It destroys all the blocks on the screen.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int flag 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DestroyBlock()
      It is the default (non-parameterized) constructor for the Block Destroyer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DestroyBlock

        public DestroyBlock()
        It is the default (non-parameterized) constructor for the Block Destroyer.

    • Method Detail

      • getImage

        public javafx.scene.image.ImageView getImage()
        Returns:
        It returns the image of the Block Destroyer (lightning in this case).

      • getLayoutX

        public double getLayoutX()
        Returns:
        It returns the X coordinate of the Block Destroyer.

      • getLayoutY

        public double getLayoutY()
        Returns:
        It returns the Y coordinate of the Block Destroyer.

      • setLayoutX

        public void setLayoutX(double x)
        Parameters:
        x - It is the X Coordinate of the Block Destroyer.

      • setLayoutY

        public void setLayoutY(double y)
        Parameters:
        y - It is the Y Coordinate of the Block Destroyer.

      • isColliding

        public void isColliding(Snake snake)
        This method checks if the Block Destroyer collides with the Snake or not. It does this by checking the difference between the x coordinates of the Snake body and the Block Destroyer.
        Parameters:
        snake - It is the main snake of the game.
